amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to Lake County for the purpose of purchasing the Lost Nation Airport from the city of Willoughby, OH.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 110-335 to provide the Secretary the authority to grant Airport Improvement Program funds no greater than $1,220,000 to Lake County for the purpose of purchasing the Lost Nation Airport from the city of Willoughby.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaTourette amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
